Real Esteli Fútbol Club is a Nicaraguan football club playing in the top flight of Nicaragua 's league system , the Campeonato Nacional de Fútbol de Primera División . The club play out of their home stadium , Estadio Independencia , based in the northern city of Estelí . Real Estelí has 13 national championships , more than any other team in Nicaragua except Diriangén . They also won a CONCACAF record eight consecutive championships from 2006 to 2014 .
/wiki/Real_Madriz: Real Madriz FC is a Nicaraguan football team playing at the top level . It is based in Somoto .
/wiki/Deportivo_Sebaco: Deportivo Sebaco is a Nicaraguan football team currently playing in the Nicaraguan Primera División . They are based in Sebaco .
/wiki/Chinandega_FC: Chinandega Futbol Clube is a Nicaraguan football team who play in the Nicaraguan Premier Division . They play their home games at the Estadio Efraín Tijerino in Chinandega . They have been playing in the top tier since winning promotion in summer 2011 .
/wiki/Diriang\u00e9n_FC: Diriangén FC is a Nicaraguan professional football club based in Diriamba which competes in Nicaraguan Premier Division ( Primera Division ) . It is one of the oldest clubs in not only Nicaragua but in Central America .
/wiki/Deportivo_Walter_Ferretti: Club Deportivo Walter Ferretti is a Nicaraguan football team who play in the Nicaraguan Premier Division . They are based in Managua .
/wiki/UNAN_Managua: Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua - Managua is a Nicaraguan football team playing in the Primera División de Nicaragua of the Nicaragua football system . It is based in Managua .
